tool_description: Converts location strings (city, address, landmark) into standardized geographic coordinates and location metadata for accommodation searches.

location_query.description: Location string such as city name, address, or landmark

country_code.description: Two-letter country code to narrow search scope

error_messages: Invalid location query: Provide a non-empty location string with at least 2 characters.
Location not found: The specified location could not be geocoded. Try a more specific or well-known location name.
Invalid country code: Use a valid two-letter ISO country code (e.g., US, CA, GB).
usage: Provide a location_query string and optionally a country_code. The tool returns geographic coordinates and standardized location information.

location_type.description: Type of location (city, landmark, address, etc.)
